sentences.sContent: The three sons also contribute to the family business.
sentences.sCn: 3个儿子也为家族企业做贡献。

synos.tran: 贡献，出力；[图情]投稿；[经]捐献
贡献，出力；[图情]投稿；[经]捐献

remMethod.val: con(完全) + tribut(给予) + e → 完全给予 → 贡献， 捐赠

words.tran: 捐助的；贡献的；有助于…的
出资的；贡献的；有助于；助长...的

trans.tranCn: 贡献， 捐赠； 有助于； 投稿
trans.tranOther: to give money, help, ideas etc to something that a lot of other people are also involved in
